about_the_game:
"Not Alone in the Space" is a visual novel for adults only. Young pilot Avis and his two adorable female partners explore space. What they encounter will turn their minds inside out, forcing them to break the chain of command and expose their inner desires.


The distant future. Mankind is exploring space and trying to make contact with an extraterrestrial civilization, but each attempt fails. So much so that the government stops trying seriously; every expedition to deep space is a mere formality.
But one day one of the expeditions stumbles upon an uncharted signal. In an attempt to bring humanity a new discovery, they are plunged into madness: a creature unknown to science has the ability to penetrate thoughts, and is about to take advantage of this to "study" them in return.
The crew of a young pilot, a sensible scientist and a spunky girl engineer must find a way out of the space trap and keep their sanity. And at the same time find common ground, maybe even something more.
You shouldn't stare into the abyss for too long - the abyss may start looking into you.


Game Features:

Emotional Journey: Deep emotions and complex character relationships fill the compelling story.
Unique Characters: Each character has a unique personality, adding depth to the story.
Atmospheric soundtrack: The sound background and music create a mood, immersing you in the atmosphere of the story.
Unexpected twists and turns: The game promises exciting plot twists, keeping players interested.
Deep emotional experience: Not Alone in the Space reveals human feelings, creating an inspiring and heartfelt story.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters showing in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 520 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
